Work

DevelopIntelligence/appendTo 2014-10 — Current

DevelopIntelligence
Support, Community, and User Research

Udemy's "user guy". Helped Udemy understand, connect with, and better serve its users.

Highlights

  • Conducted 15+ user research studies of Udemy user base (phone interviews, in-person interviews, and on-site surveys) to inform product/marketing roadmap.
  • Worked with the engineering team to fix bugs and tweak small features/copy on the site. Managed Udemy Facebook groups and Twitter page.
  • Created Never Stop Learning campaign/contest to showcase how Udemy changes people's lives (neverstoplearning.udemy.com).

Freelancing + self-teaching 2014-01-01 — 2014-08-30

Freelanced and studied web development while living in Oaxaca, Mexico.

Highlights

  • Interviewed 20 Koding (a web IDE) power users and gathered photos to create user testimonials/stories (stories.koding.com).
  • Worked with Tradeshift (a business social network) to interview and assist small/medium business owners on their platform. Helped them create case study worthy business profiles and gather structured feedback on the creation process.
  • Made a basic map application to help foreigners explore Oaxaca (oaxaqueando.net) and a music discovery application to sort/filter through Soundcloud favorites (likesorter.herokuapp.com).
